attributes.action: Keep salons in (UK, N.Ireland) open throughout covid-19.
attributes.additional_details:
From a sports massage point of view -simply cruel to turn away those in physical pain when we have the skill & experience to help reduce this for our clients. Not to mention the mental trauma and stress in the community now. I also treat several NHS frontline workers, who have cried in my salon, been overwhelmed, anxious, exhausted & longed for their 1hour massage time to relax and forget all stresses of today. It's a duty of care to our people & heros throughout this pandemic.
Let us help them!
attributes.background:
Allow salons - beauty, hair, massage, sports massage therapists to continue working during the pandemic.

Clients NEED us to maintain their mental & physical health, more than ever!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408

The UK Government is only responsible for Covid-19 restrictions. Restrictions in Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland are a matter for the devolved administrations.
